text: Portrait of Konoe Kanetsune , son of Iezane, was a Kugyō or Japanese court noble of the early Kamakura period. He held regent positions as follows: * sesshō (1237–1242) * kampaku (1242) * sesshō (1247–1252) With a daughter of Kujō Michiie he had a son Motohira. ==References== * Category:Fujiwara clan Category:Konoe family Category:1210 births Category:1259 deaths Category:People of Kamakura-period Japan Category:Japanese Buddhist monks Category:13th-century Buddhist monks
title: Konoe Kanetsune
